1: לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תַעֲשׂ֨וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Ye shall make</n> לָכֶ֜ם אֱלִילִ֗ם <sup>457 </sup> <n>you no idols</n> וּפֶ֤סֶל <sup>6459 </sup> <n>nor graven image</n> וּמַצֵּבָה֙ <sup>4676 </sup> <n>a standing image</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תָקִ֣ימוּ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>neither rear you up</n> לָכֶ֔ם וְאֶ֣בֶן <sup>68 </sup> <n>of stone</n> מַשְׂכִּ֗ית <sup>4906 </sup> <n>[any] image</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תִתְּנוּ֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>neither shall ye set up</n> בְּאַרְצְכֶ֔ם <sup>776 </sup> <n>in your land</n> לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֖ת <sup>7812 </sup> <n>to bow down</n> עָלֶ֑יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto it for I [am] the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n>
2: אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שַׁבְּתֹתַ֣י <sup>7676 </sup> <n>my sabbaths</n> תִּשְׁמֹ֔רוּ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>Ye shall keep</n> וּמִקְדָּשִׁ֖י <sup>4720 </sup> <n>my sanctuary</n> תִּירָ֑אוּ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>and reverence</n> אֲנִ֖י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>I [am] the LORD</n> ס
3: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> בְּחֻקֹּתַ֖י <sup>2708 </sup> <n>in my statutes</n> תֵּלֵ֑כוּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>walk</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מִצְוֹתַ֣י <sup>4687 </sup> <n>my commandments</n> תִּשְׁמְר֔וּ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>and keep</n> וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and do</n> אֹתָֽם׃ <sup>853 </sup>
4: וְנָתַתִּ֥י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Then I will give</n> גִשְׁמֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>1653 </sup> <n>you rain</n> בְּעִתָּ֑ם <sup>6256 </sup> <n>in due season</n> וְנָתְנָ֤ה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>shall yield</n> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and the land</n> יְבוּלָ֔הּ <sup>2981 </sup> <n>her increase</n> וְעֵ֥ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>and the trees</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n> יִתֵּ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>shall yield</n> פִּרְיֽוֹ׃ <sup>6529 </sup> <n>their fruit</n>
5: וְהִשִּׂ֨יג <sup>5381 </sup> <n>shall reach</n> לָכֶ֥ם דַּ֙יִשׁ֙ <sup>1786 </sup> <n>And your threshing</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בָּצִ֔יר <sup>1210 </sup> <n>unto the vintage</n> וּבָצִ֖יר <sup>1210 </sup> <n>and the vintage</n> יַשִּׂ֣יג <sup>5381 </sup> <n>shall reach</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> זָ֑רַע <sup>2233 </sup> <n>unto the sowing time</n> וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <sup>398 </sup> <n>and ye shall eat</n> לַחְמְכֶם֙ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>your bread</n> לָשֹׂ֔בַע <sup>7648 </sup> <n>to the full</n> וִֽישַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and dwell</n> לָבֶ֖טַח <sup>983 </sup> <n>safely</n> בְּאַרְצְכֶֽם׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in your land</n>
6: וְנָתַתִּ֤י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I will give</n> שָׁלוֹם֙ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peace</n> בָּאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> וּשְׁכַבְתֶּ֖ם <sup>7901 </sup> <n>and ye shall lie down</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> מַחֲרִ֑יד <sup>2729 </sup> <n>and none shall make [you] afraid</n> וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֞י <sup>7673 </sup> <n>and I will rid</n> חַיָּ֤ה <sup>2416 </sup> <n>beasts</n> רָעָה֙ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> וְחֶ֖רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>neither shall the sword</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and no</n> תַעֲבֹ֥ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>go</n> בְּאַרְצְכֶֽם׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>through your land</n>
7: וּרְדַפְתֶּ֖ם <sup>7291 </sup> <n>And ye shall chase</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֹיְבֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>your enemies</n> וְנָפְל֥וּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and they shall fall</n> לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> לֶחָֽרֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>you by the sword</n>
8: וְרָדְפוּ֨ <sup>7291 </sup> <n>of you shall chase</n> מִכֶּ֤ם <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> חֲמִשָּׁה֙ <sup>2568 </sup> <n>And five</n> מֵאָ֔ה <sup>3967 </sup> <n>an hundred</n> וּמֵאָ֥ה <sup>3967 </sup> <n>and an hundred</n> מִכֶּ֖ם <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> רְבָבָ֣ה <sup>7233 </sup> <n>of you shall put ten thousand</n> יִרְדֹּ֑פוּ <sup>7291 </sup> <n>to flight</n> וְנָפְל֧וּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>shall fall</n> אֹיְבֵיכֶ֛ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>and your enemies</n> לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> לֶחָֽרֶב׃ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>you by the sword</n>
9: וּפָנִ֣יתִי <sup>6437 </sup> <n>For I will have respect</n> אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>toward</n> וְהִפְרֵיתִ֣י <sup>6509 </sup> <n>unto you and make you fruitful</n> אֶתְכֶ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֖י <sup>7235 </sup> <n>and multiply</n> אֶתְכֶ֑ם <sup>853 </sup> וַהֲקִימֹתִ֥י <sup>6965 </sup> <n>you and establish</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּרִיתִ֖י <sup>1285 </sup> <n>my covenant</n> אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n>
10: וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֥ם <sup>398 </sup> <n>And ye shall eat</n> יָשָׁ֖ן <sup>3465 </sup> <n>the old</n> נוֹשָׁ֑ן <sup>3462 </sup> <n>old store</n> וְיָשָׁ֕ן <sup>3462 </sup> <n>supply</n> מִפְּנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>because</n> חָדָ֖שׁ <sup>2319 </sup> <n>of the new</n> תּוֹצִֽיאוּ׃ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and bring forth</n>
11: וְנָתַתִּ֥י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I will set</n> מִשְׁכָּנִ֖י <sup>4908 </sup> <n>my tabernacle</n> בְּתוֹכְכֶ֑ם <sup>8432 </sup> <n>among</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> תִגְעַ֥ל <sup>1602 </sup> <n>shall not abhor</n> נַפְשִׁ֖י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>you and my soul</n> אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <sup>853 </sup>
12: וְהִתְהַלַּכְתִּי֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>And I will walk</n> בְּת֣וֹכְכֶ֔ם <sup>8432 </sup> <n>among</n> וְהָיִ֥יתִי <sup>1961 </sup> <n>you and will be</n> לָכֶ֖ם לֵֽאלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> וְאַתֶּ֖ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>and ye</n> תִּהְיוּ־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>and ye shall be</n> לִ֥י לְעָֽם׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>my people</n>
13: אֲנִ֞י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>I [am] the LORD</n> אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֗ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> הוֹצֵ֤אתִי <sup>3318 </sup> <n>which brought you forth</n> אֶתְכֶם֙ <sup>853 </sup> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> מִצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> מִֽהְיֹ֥ת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָהֶ֖ם עֲבָדִ֑ים <sup>5650 </sup> <n>that ye should not be their bondmen</n> וָאֶשְׁבֹּר֙ <sup>7665 </sup> <n>and I have broken</n> מֹטֹ֣ת <sup>4133 </sup> <n>the bands</n> עֻלְּכֶ֔ם <sup>5923 </sup> <n>of your yoke</n> וָאוֹלֵ֥ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>walk</n> אֶתְכֶ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> קֽוֹמְמִיּֽוּת׃ <sup>6968 </sup> <n>upright</n> פ
14: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִשְׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>But if ye will not hearken</n> לִ֑י וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>unto me and will not do</n> אֵ֥ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַמִּצְוֹ֖ת <sup>4687 </sup> <n>all these commandments</n> הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n>
15: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> בְּחֻקֹּתַ֣י <sup>2708 </sup> <n>my statutes</n> תִּמְאָ֔סוּ <sup>3988 </sup> <n>And if ye shall despise</n> וְאִ֥ם <sup>518 </sup> <n>and if</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <sup>4941 </sup> <n>my judgments</n> תִּגְעַ֣ל <sup>1602 </sup> <n>abhor</n> נַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>or if your soul</n> לְבִלְתִּ֤י <sup>1115 </sup> <n>not</n> עֲשׂוֹת֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>so that ye will not do</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מִצְוֹתַ֔י <sup>4687 </sup> <n>all my commandments</n> לְהַפְרְכֶ֖ם <sup>6565 </sup> <n>[but] that ye break</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּרִיתִֽי׃ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>my covenant</n>
16: אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>turn</n> אֲנִ֞י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>I also will do</n> זֹּ֣את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> לָכֶ֗ם וְהִפְקַדְתִּ֨י <sup>6485 </sup> <n>this unto you I will even appoint</n> עֲלֵיכֶ֤ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> בֶּֽהָלָה֙ <sup>928 </sup> <n>over you terror</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַשַּׁחֶ֣פֶת <sup>7829 </sup> <n>consumption</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַקַּדַּ֔חַת <sup>6920 </sup> <n>and the burning ague</n> מְכַלּ֥וֹת <sup>3615 </sup> <n>that shall consume</n> עֵינַ֖יִם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>the eyes</n> וּמְדִיבֹ֣ת <sup>1727 </sup> <n>and cause sorrow</n> נָ֑פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>of heart</n> וּזְרַעְתֶּ֤ם <sup>2232 </sup> <n>and ye shall sow</n> לָרִיק֙ <sup>7385 </sup> <n>in vain</n> זַרְעֲכֶ֔ם <sup>2233 </sup> <n>your seed</n> וַאֲכָלֻ֖הוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall eat</n> אֹיְבֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>341 </sup> <n>for your enemies</n>
17: וְנָתַתִּ֤י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I will set</n> פָנַי֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>my face</n> בָּכֶ֔ם וְנִגַּפְתֶּ֖ם <sup>5062 </sup> <n>against you and ye shall be slain</n> לִפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> אֹיְבֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>your enemies</n> וְרָד֤וּ <sup>7287 </sup> <n>you shall reign</n> בָכֶם֙ שֹֽׂנְאֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>8130 </sup> <n>they that hate</n> וְנַסְתֶּ֖ם <sup>5127 </sup> <n>over you and ye shall flee</n> וְאֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> רֹדֵ֥ף <sup>7291 </sup> <n>when none pursueth</n> אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <sup>853 </sup> ס
18: וְאִ֨ם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>And if ye will not yet</n> אֵ֔לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִשְׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>for all this hearken</n> לִ֑י וְיָסַפְתִּי֙ <sup>3254 </sup> <n>more</n> לְיַסְּרָ֣ה <sup>3256 </sup> <n>unto me then I will punish</n> אֶתְכֶ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> שֶׁ֖בַע <sup>7651 </sup> <n>you seven times</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> חַטֹּאתֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>for your sins</n>
19: וְשָׁבַרְתִּ֖י <sup>7665 </sup> <n>And I will break</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גְּא֣וֹן <sup>1347 </sup> <n>the pride</n> עֻזְּכֶ֑ם <sup>5797 </sup> <n>of your power</n> וְנָתַתִּ֤י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and I will make</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁמֵיכֶם֙ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>your heaven</n> כַּבַּרְזֶ֔ל <sup>1270 </sup> <n>as iron</n> וְאֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַרְצְכֶ֖ם <sup>776 </sup> <n>and your earth</n> כַּנְּחֻשָֽׁה׃ <sup>5154 </sup> <n>as brass</n>
20: וְתַ֥ם <sup>8552 </sup> <n>shall be spent</n> לָרִ֖יק <sup>7385 </sup> <n>in vain</n> כֹּחֲכֶ֑ם <sup>3581 </sup> <n>And your strength</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> תִתֵּ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>shall not yield</n> אַרְצְכֶם֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>for your land</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְבוּלָ֔הּ <sup>2981 </sup> <n>her increase</n> וְעֵ֣ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>neither shall the trees</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the land</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> יִתֵּ֖ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>yield</n> פִּרְיֽוֹ׃ <sup>6529 </sup> <n>their fruits</n>
21: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> תֵּֽלְכ֤וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>act</n> עִמִּי֙ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> קֶ֔רִי <sup>7147 </sup> <n>contrary</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תֹאב֖וּ <sup>14 </sup> <n>unto me and will</n> לִשְׁמֹ֣עַֽ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>not hearken</n> לִ֑י וְיָסַפְתִּ֤י <sup>3254 </sup> <n>more</n> עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> מַכָּ֔ה <sup>4347 </sup> <n>plagues</n> שֶׁ֖בַע <sup>7651 </sup> <n>seven times</n> כְּחַטֹּאתֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>upon you according to your sins</n>
22: וְהִשְׁלַחְתִּ֨י <sup>7971 </sup> <n>I will also send</n> בָכֶ֜ם אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> חַיַּ֤ת <sup>2416 </sup> <n>beasts</n> הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>wild</n> וְשִׁכְּלָ֣ה <sup>7921 </sup> <n>among you which shall rob you of your children</n> אֶתְכֶ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> וְהִכְרִ֙יתָה֙ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>and destroy</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּהֶמְתְּכֶ֔ם <sup>929 </sup> <n>your cattle</n> וְהִמְעִ֖יטָה <sup>4591 </sup> <n>and make you few in number</n> אֶתְכֶ֑ם <sup>853 </sup> וְנָשַׁ֖מּוּ <sup>8074 </sup> <n>shall be desolate</n> דַּרְכֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>and your [high] ways</n>
23: וְאִ֨ם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>and if</n> בְּאֵ֔לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> תִוָּסְר֖וּ <sup>3256 </sup> <n>And if ye will not be reformed</n> לִ֑י וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֥ם <sup>1980 </sup> <n>by me by these things but will walk</n> עִמִּ֖י <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> קֶֽרִי׃ <sup>7147 </sup> <n>contrary</n>
24: וְהָלַכְתִּ֧י <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Then will I also walk</n> אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>yet</n> אֲנִ֛י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> עִמָּכֶ֖ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> בְּקֶ֑רִי <sup>7147 </sup> <n>contrary</n> וְהִכֵּיתִ֤י <sup>5221 </sup> <n>unto you and will punish</n> אֶתְכֶם֙ <sup>853 </sup> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>you yet</n> אָ֔נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>you</n> שֶׁ֖בַע <sup>7651 </sup> <n>seven times</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> חַטֹּאתֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>for your sins</n>
25: וְהֵבֵאתִ֨י <sup>935 </sup> <n>And I will bring</n> עֲלֵיכֶ֜ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> חֶ֗רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>a sword</n> נֹקֶ֙מֶת֙ <sup>5358 </sup> <n>upon you that shall avenge</n> נְקַם־ <sup>5359 </sup> <n>the quarrel</n> בְּרִ֔ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>of [my] covenant</n> וְנֶאֱסַפְתֶּ֖ם <sup>622 </sup> <n>and when ye are gathered together</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>within</n> עָרֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>5892 </sup> <n>your cities</n> וְשִׁלַּ֤חְתִּי <sup>7971 </sup> <n>I will send</n> דֶ֙בֶר֙ <sup>1698 </sup> <n>the pestilence</n> בְּת֣וֹכְכֶ֔ם <sup>8432 </sup> <n>among</n> וְנִתַּתֶּ֖ם <sup>5414 </sup> <n>you and ye shall be delivered</n> בְּיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>into the hand</n> אוֹיֵֽב׃ <sup>341 </sup> <n>of the enemy</n>
26: בְּשִׁבְרִ֣י <sup>7665 </sup> <n>[And] when I have broken</n> לָכֶם֮ מַטֵּה־ <sup>4294 </sup> <n>the staff</n> לֶחֶם֒ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>of your bread</n> וְ֠אָפוּ <sup>644 </sup> <n>shall bake</n> עֶ֣שֶׂר <sup>6235 </sup> <n>ten</n> נָשִׁ֤ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>women</n> לַחְמְכֶם֙ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>your bread</n> בְּתַנּ֣וּר <sup>8574 </sup> <n>oven</n> אֶחָ֔ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>in one</n> וְהֵשִׁ֥יבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>again</n> לַחְמְכֶ֖ם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>[you] your bread</n> בַּמִּשְׁקָ֑ל <sup>4948 </sup> <n>by weight</n> וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֖ם <sup>398 </sup> <n>and ye shall eat</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִשְׂבָּֽעוּ׃ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>and not be satisfied</n> ס
27: וְאִ֨ם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> בְּזֹ֔את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>And if ye will not for all this</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִשְׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>hearken</n> לִ֑י וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֥ם <sup>1980 </sup> <n>unto me but walk</n> עִמִּ֖י <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> בְּקֶֽרִי׃ <sup>7147 </sup> <n>contrary</n>
28: וְהָלַכְתִּ֥י <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Then I will walk</n> עִמָּכֶ֖ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> בַּחֲמַת־ <sup>2534 </sup> <n>unto you also in fury</n> קֶ֑רִי <sup>7147 </sup> <n>contrary</n> וְיִסַּרְתִּ֤י <sup>3256 </sup> <n>I will chastise</n> אֶתְכֶם֙ <sup>853 </sup> אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>and I even</n> אָ֔נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>you</n> שֶׁ֖בַע <sup>7651 </sup> <n>you seven times</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> חַטֹּאתֵיכֶם׃ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>for your sins</n>
29: וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֖ם <sup>398 </sup> <n>And ye shall eat</n> בְּשַׂ֣ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>the flesh</n> בְּנֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of your sons</n> וּבְשַׂ֥ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>and the flesh</n> בְּנֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>1323 </sup> <n>of your daughters</n> תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall ye eat</n>
30: וְהִשְׁמַדְתִּ֞י <sup>8045 </sup> <n>And I will destroy</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בָּמֹֽתֵיכֶ֗ם <sup>1116 </sup> <n>your high places</n> וְהִכְרַתִּי֙ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>and cut down</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> חַמָּ֣נֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>2553 </sup> <n>your images</n> וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and cast</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פִּגְרֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>6297 </sup> <n>your carcases</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> פִּגְרֵ֖י <sup>6297 </sup> <n>upon the carcases</n> גִּלּוּלֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>1544 </sup> <n>of your idols</n> וְגָעֲלָ֥ה <sup>1602 </sup> <n>shall abhor</n> נַפְשִׁ֖י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and my soul</n> אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <sup>853 </sup>
31: וְנָתַתִּ֤י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I will make</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עָֽרֵיכֶם֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>your cities</n> חָרְבָּ֔ה <sup>2723 </sup> <n>waste</n> וַהֲשִׁמּוֹתִ֖י <sup>8074 </sup> <n>unto desolation</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מִקְדְּשֵׁיכֶ֑ם <sup>4720 </sup> <n>your sanctuaries</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and I will not</n> אָרִ֔יחַ <sup>7306 </sup> <n>and I will not smell</n> בְּרֵ֖יחַ <sup>7381 </sup> <n>the savour</n> נִיחֹֽחֲכֶֽם׃ <sup>5207 </sup> <n>of your sweet odours</n>
32: וַהֲשִׁמֹּתִ֥י <sup>8074 </sup> <n>into desolation</n> אֲנִ֖י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> וְשָֽׁמְמ֤וּ <sup>8074 </sup> <n>therein shall be astonished</n> עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> אֹֽיְבֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>and your enemies</n> הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <sup>3427 </sup> <n>which dwell</n> בָּֽהּ׃
33: וְאֶתְכֶם֙ <sup>853 </sup> אֱזָרֶ֣ה <sup>2219 </sup> <n>And I will scatter</n> בַגּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>you among the heathen</n> וַהֲרִיקֹתִ֥י <sup>7324 </sup> <n>and will draw out</n> אַחֲרֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> חָ֑רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>a sword</n> וְהָיְתָ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>becomes</n> אַרְצְכֶם֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>you and your land</n> שְׁמָמָ֔ה <sup>8077 </sup> <n>shall be desolate</n> וְעָרֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>5892 </sup> <n>and your cities</n> יִהְי֥וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> חָרְבָּֽה׃ <sup>2723 </sup> <n>waste</n>
34: אָז֩ <sup>227 </sup> <n>Then</n> תִּרְצֶ֨ה <sup>7521 </sup> <n>enjoy</n> הָאָ֜רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>Then shall the land</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שַׁבְּתֹתֶ֗יהָ <sup>7676 </sup> <n>her sabbaths</n> כֹּ֚ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יְמֵ֣י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>as long</n> הֳשַׁמָּ֔ה <sup>8074 </sup> <n>as it lieth desolate</n> וְאַתֶּ֖ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>land</n> אֹיְבֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>and ye [be] in your enemies'</n> אָ֚ז <sup>227 </sup> <n>then</n> תִּשְׁבַּ֣ת <sup>7673 </sup> <n>rest</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>[even] then shall the land</n> וְהִרְצָ֖ת <sup>7521 </sup> <n>and enjoy</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שַׁבְּתֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>7676 </sup> <n>her sabbaths</n>
35: כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> יְמֵ֥י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>As long as</n> הָשַּׁמָּ֖ה <sup>8074 </sup> <n>it lieth desolate</n> תִּשְׁבֹּ֑ת <sup>7673 </sup> <n>it shall rest</n> אֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> שָׁבְתָ֛ה <sup>7673 </sup> <n>because it did not rest</n> בְּשַׁבְּתֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>7676 </sup> <n>in your sabbaths</n> בְּשִׁבְתְּכֶ֥ם <sup>3427 </sup> <n>when ye dwelt</n> עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n>
36: וְהַנִּשְׁאָרִ֣ים <sup>7604 </sup> <n>And upon them that are left</n> בָּכֶ֔ם וְהֵבֵ֤אתִי <sup>935 </sup> <n>[alive] of you I will send</n> מֹ֙רֶךְ֙ <sup>4816 </sup> <n>a faintness</n> בִּלְבָבָ֔ם <sup>3824 </sup> <n>into their hearts</n> בְּאַרְצֹ֖ת <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the lands</n> אֹיְבֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>of their enemies</n> וְרָדַ֣ף <sup>7291 </sup> <n>shall chase</n> אֹתָ֗ם <sup>853 </sup> ק֚וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>and the sound</n> עָלֶ֣ה <sup>5929 </sup> <n>leaf</n> נִדָּ֔ף <sup>5086 </sup> <n>of a shaken</n> וְנָס֧וּ <sup>5127 </sup> <n>them and they shall flee</n> מְנֻֽסַת־ <sup>4499 </sup> <n>as fleeing</n> חֶ֛רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>from a sword</n> וְנָפְל֖וּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and they shall fall</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> רֹדֵֽף׃ <sup>7291 </sup> <n>when none pursueth</n>
37: וְכָשְׁל֧וּ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>And they shall fall</n> אִישׁ־ <sup>376 </sup> <n>one</n> בְּאָחִ֛יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>upon another</n> כְּמִפְּנֵי־ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>as it were before</n> חֶ֖רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>a sword</n> וְרֹדֵ֣ף <sup>7291 </sup> <n>when none pursueth</n> אָ֑יִן <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and you</n> תִֽהְיֶ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will have</n> לָכֶם֙ תְּקוּמָ֔ה <sup>8617 </sup> <n>and ye shall have no power to stand</n> לִפְנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> אֹֽיְבֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>341 </sup> <n>your enemies</n>
38: וַאֲבַדְתֶּ֖ם <sup>6 </sup> <n>And ye shall perish</n> בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among the heathen</n> וְאָכְלָ֣ה <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall eat you up</n> אֶתְכֶ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> אֶ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and the land</n> אֹיְבֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>341 </sup> <n>of your enemies</n>
39: וְהַנִּשְׁאָרִ֣ים <sup>7604 </sup> <n>And they that are left</n> בָּכֶ֗ם יִמַּ֙קּוּ֙ <sup>4743 </sup> <n>of you shall pine away</n> בַּֽעֲוֹנָ֔ם <sup>5771 </sup> <n>in their iniquity</n> בְּאַרְצֹ֖ת <sup>776 </sup> <n>lands</n> אֹיְבֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>in your enemies'</n> וְאַ֛ף <sup>637 </sup> <n>and also</n> בַּעֲוֹנֹ֥ת <sup>5771 </sup> <n>and also in the iniquities</n> אֲבֹתָ֖ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>of their fathers</n> אִתָּ֥ם <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> יִמָּֽקּוּ׃ <sup>4743 </sup> <n>shall they pine away</n>
40: וְהִתְוַדּ֤וּ <sup>3034 </sup> <n>If they shall confess</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֲוֹנָם֙ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>their iniquity</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֲוֹ֣ן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>and the iniquity</n> אֲבֹתָ֔ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>of their fathers</n> בְּמַעֲלָ֖ם <sup>4604 </sup> <n>with their trespass</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> מָֽעֲלוּ־ <sup>4604 </sup> <n>falsehood</n> בִ֑י וְאַ֕ף <sup>637 </sup> <n>and also</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הָֽלְכ֥וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>against me and that also they have walked</n> עִמִּ֖י <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> בְּקֶֽרִי׃ <sup>7147 </sup> <n>contrary</n>
41: אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>also</n> אֲנִ֗י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אֵלֵ֤ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>was acting</n> עִמָּם֙ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> בְּקֶ֔רִי <sup>7147 </sup> <n>contrary</n> וְהֵבֵאתִ֣י <sup>935 </sup> <n>unto them and have brought</n> אֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>them into the land</n> אֹיְבֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>of their enemies</n> אוֹ־ <sup>176 </sup> <n>if then</n> אָ֣ז <sup>227 </sup> <n>if</n> יִכָּנַ֗ע <sup>3665 </sup> <n>be humbled</n> לְבָבָם֙ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>hearts</n> הֶֽעָרֵ֔ל <sup>6189 </sup> <n>their uncircumcised</n> וְאָ֖ז <sup>227 </sup> <n>then</n> יִרְצ֥וּ <sup>7521 </sup> <n>and they then accept</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֲוֹנָֽם׃ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>of the punishment of their iniquity</n>
42: וְזָכַרְתִּ֖י <sup>2142 </sup> <n>Then will I remember</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּרִיתִ֣י <sup>1285 </sup> <n>my covenant</n> יַעֲק֑וֹב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>with Jacob</n> וְאַף֩ <sup>637 </sup> <n>also</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּרִיתִ֨י <sup>1285 </sup> <n>and also my covenant</n> יִצְחָ֜ק <sup>3327 </sup> <n>with Isaac</n> וְאַ֨ף <sup>637 </sup> <n>well</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּרִיתִ֧י <sup>1285 </sup> <n>and also my covenant</n> אַבְרָהָ֛ם <sup>85 </sup> <n>with Abraham</n> אֶזְכֹּ֖ר <sup>2142 </sup> <n>will I remember</n> וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> אֶזְכֹּֽר׃ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>and I will remember</n>
43: וְהָאָרֶץ֩ <sup>776 </sup> <n>The land</n> תֵּעָזֵ֨ב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>also shall be left</n> מֵהֶ֜ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>them</n> וְתִ֣רֶץ <sup>7521 </sup> <n>of them and shall enjoy</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שַׁבְּתֹתֶ֗יהָ <sup>7676 </sup> <n>her sabbaths</n> בָּהְשַׁמָּה֙ <sup>8074 </sup> <n>while she lieth desolate</n> מֵהֶ֔ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> וְהֵ֖ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> יִרְצ֣וּ <sup>7521 </sup> <n>without them and they shall accept</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֲוֹנָ֑ם <sup>5771 </sup> <n>of the punishment of their iniquity</n> יַ֣עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>because</n> וּבְיַ֔עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>even because</n> בְּמִשְׁפָּטַ֣י <sup>4941 </sup> <n>my judgments</n> מָאָ֔סוּ <sup>3988 </sup> <n>they despised</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> חֻקֹּתַ֖י <sup>2708 </sup> <n>my statutes</n> גָּעֲלָ֥ה <sup>1602 </sup> <n>abhorred</n> נַפְשָֽׁם׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and because their soul</n>
44: וְאַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>And yet</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>when they be</n> זֹ֠את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>for all that</n> בִּֽהְיוֹתָ֞ם <sup>1961 </sup> <n>are in</n> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>of their enemies</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> מְאַסְתִּ֤ים <sup>3988 </sup> <n>I will not cast them away</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> גְעַלְתִּים֙ <sup>1602 </sup> <n>neither will I abhor</n> לְכַלֹּתָ֔ם <sup>3615 </sup> <n>them to destroy them utterly</n> לְהָפֵ֥ר <sup>6565 </sup> <n>and to break</n> בְּרִיתִ֖י <sup>1285 </sup> <n>my covenant</n> אִתָּ֑ם <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>with them for I [am] the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>their God</n>
